attributes.action: ALL members of the House of Lords & Commons to undergo random drug tests.
attributes.background: In the wake of another scandal in the House of Lords I would like ALL members the House of Lords and the House of Commons to undergo regular random drug tests.  This happens in many other civil service positions of responsibility and should be extended to Peers and MPs.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
